response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, we propose a purchase price of $1,400,000. We are confident this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and a reasonable investment for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
